May 22, 1954 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)

Moments with Wagner
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest 1st Royston New Monckton, 2nd Hade Edge. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £6, 5th £4. 9 bands competed
